titleInfo.title: Fourth of July Celebration in Aspen, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#102 Fourth of July, Aspen, 1914'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#102 Fourth of July Aspen 1914 donated by: Silas Kobey.''

mods.abstract: Fourth of July Celebration in Aspen, Colorado. An unidentified woman is standing outside on a wooden stage. A large American flag is strung up at the back of the stage, between two trees. A crowd of people is circled around the stage and a band is playing.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
